children.text: 5 Things Burglars Don't Want You To Know
Intruders try to breach your home and know exactly how your security system works. Keep them at bay with Vivint wireless security cameras. Learn more!
I'd like a table by the window.
I'd like a table in non-smoking area.
我想要一张在非吸烟区的桌子。
wǒ xiǎng yào yì zhāng zài fēi xī yān qū de zhuō zi。
Can I have the menu please?
Can I have the same dish as that?
